00057   const char *usage =
00058     "\n"
00059     "Usage: ht_generate_load [options] <type>\n\n"
00060     "Description:\n"
00061     "  This program is used to generate load on a Hypertable\n"
00062     "  cluster.  The <type> argument indicates the type of load\n"
00063     "  to generate ('query' or 'update').\n\n"
00064     "Options";
00065 
00066   struct AppPolicy : Config::Policy {
00067     static void init_options() {
00068       allow_unregistered_options(true);
00069       cmdline_desc(usage).add_options()
00070         ("help,h", "Show this help message and exit")
00071         ("help-config", "Show help message for config properties")
00072         ("table", str()->default_value("LoadTest"), "Name of table to query/update")
00073         ("max-bytes", i64(), "Amount of data to generate, measured by number "
00074          "of key and value bytes produced")
00075         ("query-delay", i32(), "Delay milliseconds between each query")
00076         ("sample-file", str(),
00077          "Output file to hold request latencies, one per line")
00078         ("seed", i32()->default_value(1), "Pseudo-random number generator seed")
00079         ("spec-file", str(),
00080          "File containing the DataGenerator specificaiton")
00081         ("stdout", boo()->zero_tokens()->default_value(false),
00082          "Display generated data to stdout instead of sending load to cluster")
00083         ("verbose,v", boo()->zero_tokens()->default_value(false),
00084          "Show more verbose output")
00085         ("flush", boo()->zero_tokens()->default_value(false), "Flush after each update")
00086         ("no-log-sync", boo()->zero_tokens()->default_value(false), "Don't sync rangeserver commit logs on autoflush")
00087         ("flush-interval", i64()->default_value(0),
00088          "Amount of data after which to mutator buffers are flushed "
00089          "and commit log is synced. Only used if no-log-sync flag is on")
00090         ("version", "Show version information and exit")
00091         ;
00092       alias("max-bytes", "DataGenerator.MaxBytes");
00093       alias("seed", "DataGenerator.Seed");
00094       cmdline_hidden_desc().add_options()
00095         ("type", str(), "Type (update or query).");
00096       cmdline_positional_desc().add("type", 1);
00097     }
00098   };
00099 }

00102 typedef Meta::list<AppPolicy, DataGeneratorPolicy, DefaultCommPolicy> Policies;

00104 void generate_update_load(PropertiesPtr &props, String &tablename, bool flush, bool no_log_sync,
00105                           uint64_t flush_interval, bool to_stdout, String &sample_fname);
00106 void generate_query_load(PropertiesPtr &props, String &tablename, bool to_stdout, int32_t delay, String &sample_fname);
00107 double std_dev(uint64_t nn, double sum, double sq_sum);
00108 void parse_command_line(int argc, char **argv, PropertiesPtr &props);
00109 
00110 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00111   String table, load_type, spec_file, sample_fname;
00112   PropertiesPtr generator_props = new Properties();
00113   bool flush, to_stdout, no_log_sync;
00114   uint64_t flush_interval=0;
00115   int32_t query_delay = 0;
00116 
00117   try {
00118     init_with_policies<Policies>(argc, argv);
00119 
00120     if (!has("type")) {
00121       std::cout << cmdline_desc() << std::flush;
00122       _exit(0);
00123     }
00124 
00125     load_type = get_str("type");
00126 
00127     table = get_str("table");
00128 
00129     sample_fname = has("sample-file") ? get_str("sample-file") : "";
00130 
00131     if (has("query-delay"))
00132       query_delay = get_i32("query-delay");
00133 
00134     flush = get_bool("flush");
00135     no_log_sync = get_bool("no-log-sync");
00136     to_stdout = get_bool("stdout");
00137     if (no_log_sync)
00138       flush_interval = get_i64("flush-interval");
00139 
00140     if (has("spec-file")) {
00141       spec_file = get_str("spec-file");
00142       if (FileUtils::exists(spec_file))
00143         generator_props->load(spec_file, cmdline_hidden_desc(), true);
00144       else
00145         HT_THROW(Error::FILE_NOT_FOUND, spec_file);
00146     }
00147 
00148     parse_command_line(argc, argv, generator_props);
00149 
00150     if (load_type == "update")
00151       generate_update_load(generator_props, table, flush, no_log_sync, flush_interval,
00152                            to_stdout, sample_fname);
00153     else if (load_type == "query")
00154       generate_query_load(generator_props, table, to_stdout, query_delay, sample_fname);
00155     else {
00156       std::cout << cmdline_desc() << std::flush;
00157       _exit(1);
00158     }
00159   }
00160   catch (Exception &e) {
00161     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00162     exit(1);
00163   }
00164 
00165   fflush(stdout);
00166   _exit(0); // don't bother with static objects
00167 }

00169 
00170 void parse_command_line(int argc, char **argv, PropertiesPtr &props) {
00171   const char *ptr;
00172   String key, value;
00173   props->parse_args(argc, argv, cmdline_desc(), 0, 0, true);
00174   for (int i=1; i<argc; i++) {
00175     if (argv[i][0] == '-') {
00176       ptr = strchr(argv[i], '=');
00177       if (ptr) {
00178         key = String(argv[i], ptr-argv[i]);
00179         trim_if(key, is_any_of("-"));
00180         value = String(ptr+1);
00181         trim_if(value, is_any_of("'\""));
00182         if (key == ("DataGenerator.MaxBytes"))
00183           props->set(key, boost::any( strtoll(value.c_str(), 0, 0) ));
00184         else if (key == "DataGenerator.Seed")
00185           props->set(key, boost::any( atoi(value.c_str()) ));
00186         else if (key == "rowkey.seed")
00187           props->set(key, boost::any( atoi(value.c_str()) ));
00188         else
00189           props->set(key, boost::any(value));
00190       }
00191       else {
00192         key = String(argv[i]);
00193         trim_if(key, is_any_of("-"));
00194         if (!props->has(key))
00195           props->set(key, boost::any( true ));
00196       }
00197     }
00198   }
00199 }

00201 
00202 void generate_update_load(PropertiesPtr &props, String &tablename, bool flush,
00203                           bool no_log_sync, uint64_t flush_interval,
00204                           bool to_stdout, String &sample_fname)
00205 {
00206   double cum_latency=0, cum_sq_latency=0, latency=0;
00207   double min_latency=10000000, max_latency=0;
00208   uint64_t total_cells=0;
00209   Cells cells;
00210   clock_t start_clocks=0, stop_clocks=0;
00211   double clocks_per_usec = (double)CLOCKS_PER_SEC / 1000000.0;
00212   bool output_samples = false;
00213   ofstream sample_file;
00214   DataGenerator dg(props);
00215   uint32_t mutator_flags=0;
00216   uint64_t unflushed_data=0;
00217 
00218   if (no_log_sync)
00219     mutator_flags |= TableMutator::FLAG_NO_LOG_SYNC;
00220 
00221   if (to_stdout) {
00222     cout << "rowkey\tcolumnkey\tvalue\n";
00223     for (DataGenerator::iterator iter = dg.begin(); iter != dg.end(); iter++) {
00224       if ((*iter).column_qualifier == 0 || *(*iter).column_qualifier == 0)
00225         cout << (*iter).row_key << "\t" << (*iter).column_family
00226              << "\t" << (const char *)(*iter).value << "\n";
00227       else
00228         cout << (*iter).row_key << "\t" << (*iter).column_family << ":"
00229              << (*iter).column_qualifier << "\t" << (const char *)(*iter).value << "\n";
00230     }
00231     cout << flush;
00232     return;
00233   }
00234 
00235   if (sample_fname != "") {
00236     sample_file.open(sample_fname.c_str());
00237     output_samples = true;
00238   }
00239 
00240   Stopwatch stopwatch;
00241 
00242   try {
00243     ClientPtr hypertable_client_ptr;
00244     TablePtr table_ptr;
00245     TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
00246     String config_file = get_str("config");
00247     boost::progress_display progress_meter(dg.get_limit());
00248 
00249     if (config_file != "")
00250       hypertable_client_ptr = new Hypertable::Client(config_file);
00251     else
00252       hypertable_client_ptr = new Hypertable::Client();
00253 
00254     table_ptr = hypertable_client_ptr->open_table(tablename);
00255     mutator_ptr = table_ptr->create_mutator(0, mutator_flags);
00256 
00257     for (DataGenerator::iterator iter = dg.begin(); iter != dg.end(); iter++) {
00258 
00259       // do update
00260       cells.clear();
00261       cells.push_back(*iter);
00262       if (flush)
00263         start_clocks = clock();
00264 
00265       mutator_ptr->set_cells(cells);
00266 
00267       if (flush) {
00268         mutator_ptr->flush();
00269         stop_clocks = clock();
00270         if (stop_clocks < start_clocks)
00271           latency = ((std::numeric_limits<clock_t>::max() - start_clocks) + stop_clocks) / clocks_per_usec;
00272         else
00273           latency = (stop_clocks-start_clocks) / clocks_per_usec;
00274         if (output_samples)
00275           sample_file << (unsigned long)latency << "\n";
00276         else {
00277           cum_latency += latency;
00278           cum_sq_latency += pow(latency,2);
00279           if (latency < min_latency)
00280             min_latency = latency;
00281           if (latency > max_latency)
00282             max_latency = latency;
00283         }
00284       }
00285       else if (flush_interval>0) {
00286         // if flush interval was specified then keep track of how much data is currently
00287         // not flushed and call flush once the flush interval limit is reached
00288         unflushed_data += iter.last_data_size();
00289         if (unflushed_data > flush_interval) {
00290           mutator_ptr->flush();
00291           unflushed_data = 0;
00292         }
00293 
00294       }
00295 
00296       ++total_cells;
00297       progress_meter += iter.last_data_size();
00298     }
00299 
00300     mutator_ptr->flush();
00301 
00302   }
00303   catch (Exception &e) {
00304     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00305     exit(1);
00306   }
00307 
00308 
00309   stopwatch.stop();
00310 
00311   printf("\n");
00312   printf("\n");
00313   printf("        Elapsed time: %.2f s\n", stopwatch.elapsed());
00314   printf("Total cells inserted: %llu\n", (Llu) total_cells);
00315   printf("Throughput (cells/s): %.2f\n", (double)total_cells/stopwatch.elapsed());
00316   printf("Total bytes inserted: %llu\n", (Llu)dg.get_limit());
00317   printf("Throughput (bytes/s): %.2f\n", (double)dg.get_limit()/stopwatch.elapsed());
00318 
00319   if (flush && !output_samples) {
00320     printf("  Latency min (usec): %llu\n", (Llu)min_latency);
00321     printf("  Latency max (usec): %llu\n", (Llu)max_latency);
00322     printf("  Latency avg (usec): %llu\n", (Llu)((double)cum_latency/total_cells));
00323     printf("Latency stddev (usec): %llu\n", (Llu)std_dev(total_cells, cum_latency, cum_sq_latency));
00324   }
00325   printf("\n");
00326 
00327   if (output_samples)
00328     sample_file.close();
00329 
00330 }
00331 
00332 
00333 void generate_query_load(PropertiesPtr &props, String &tablename, bool to_stdout, int32_t delay, String &sample_fname)
00334 {
00335   double cum_latency=0, cum_sq_latency=0, latency=0;
00336   double min_latency=10000000, max_latency=0;
00337   uint64_t total_cells=0;
00338   Cells cells;
00339   clock_t start_clocks, stop_clocks;
00340   double clocks_per_usec = (double)CLOCKS_PER_SEC / 1000000.0;
00341   bool output_samples = false;
00342   ofstream sample_file;
00343   DataGenerator dg(props, true);
00344 
00345   if (to_stdout) {
00346     for (DataGenerator::iterator iter = dg.begin(); iter != dg.end(); iter++) {
00347       if (*(*iter).column_qualifier == 0)
00348         cout << (*iter).row_key << "\t" << (*iter).column_family << "\n";
00349       else
00350         cout << (*iter).row_key << "\t" << (*iter).column_family << ":"
00351              << (*iter).column_qualifier << "\n";
00352     }
00353     cout << flush;
00354     return;
00355   }
00356 
00357   if (sample_fname != "") {
00358     sample_file.open(sample_fname.c_str());
00359     output_samples = true;
00360   }
00361 
00362   Stopwatch stopwatch;
00363 
00364   try {
00365     ClientPtr hypertable_client_ptr;
00366     TablePtr table_ptr;
00367     ScanSpecBuilder scan_spec;
00368     Cell cell;
00369     String config_file = get_str("config");
00370     boost::progress_display progress_meter(dg.get_limit());
00371 
00372     if (config_file != "")
00373       hypertable_client_ptr = new Hypertable::Client(config_file);
00374     else
00375       hypertable_client_ptr = new Hypertable::Client();
00376 
00377     table_ptr = hypertable_client_ptr->open_table(tablename);
00378 
00379     for (DataGenerator::iterator iter = dg.begin(); iter != dg.end(); iter++) {
00380 
00381       if (delay)
00382         poll(0, 0, delay);
00383 
00384       scan_spec.clear();
00385       scan_spec.add_column((*iter).column_family);
00386       scan_spec.add_row((*iter).row_key);
00387 
00388       start_clocks = clock();
00389 
00390       TableScanner *scanner_ptr=table_ptr->create_scanner(scan_spec.get());
00391 
00392       while (scanner_ptr->next(cell))
00393         ;
00394 
00395       delete scanner_ptr;
00396 
00397       stop_clocks = clock();
00398       if (stop_clocks < start_clocks)
00399         latency = ((std::numeric_limits<clock_t>::max() - start_clocks) + stop_clocks) / clocks_per_usec;
00400       else
00401         latency = (stop_clocks-start_clocks) / clocks_per_usec;
00402       if (output_samples)
00403         sample_file << (unsigned long)latency << "\n";
00404       else {
00405         cum_latency += latency;
00406         cum_sq_latency += pow(latency,2);
00407         if (latency < min_latency)
00408           min_latency = latency;
00409         if (latency > max_latency)
00410           max_latency = latency;
00411       }
00412 
00413       ++total_cells;
00414       progress_meter += iter.last_data_size();
00415     }
00416   }
00417   catch (Exception &e) {
00418     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00419     exit(1);
00420   }
00421 
00422   stopwatch.stop();
00423 
00424   printf("\n");
00425   printf("\n");
00426   printf("        Elapsed time: %.2f s\n", stopwatch.elapsed());
00427   printf("Total cells inserted: %llu\n", (Llu) total_cells);
00428   printf("Throughput (cells/s): %.2f\n", (double)total_cells/stopwatch.elapsed());
00429   printf("Total bytes inserted: %llu\n", (Llu)dg.get_limit());
00430   printf("Throughput (bytes/s): %.2f\n", (double)dg.get_limit()/stopwatch.elapsed());
00431 
00432   if (!output_samples) {
00433     printf("  Latency min (usec): %llu\n", (Llu)min_latency);
00434     printf("  Latency max (usec): %llu\n", (Llu)max_latency);
00435     printf("  Latency avg (usec): %llu\n", (Llu)((double)cum_latency/total_cells));
00436     printf("Latency stddev (usec): %llu\n", (Llu)std_dev(total_cells, cum_latency, cum_sq_latency));
00437   }
00438   printf("\n");
00439 
00440   if (output_samples)
00441     sample_file.close();
00442 }

00445 
00452 double std_dev(uint64_t nn, double sum, double sq_sum)
00453 {
00454   double mean = sum/nn;
00455   double sq_std = sqrt((sq_sum/(double)nn) - pow(mean,2));
00456   return sq_std;
00457 }
